column4: i have ubuntu installed and everytime i try to boot to it, it'll go through the load screen and then my monitor will flash "no signal" then it will just sit black forever. i have an 8800GT GPS, p5ne-sli mobo, and e8400 proc. thanks for any help
run a live distro which can access your hdd and change xorg.conf if you can't get it to boot to terminal somehow
